Game_Structure

Class Crop_Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_Structure.Crop_Plot

  • public class Crop_Plot
extends java.lang.Object
    Crop Plot Class is implemented as a Model-class (Project is trying to approach to Model-view-controller design pattern) This class specifically implemented for data storing for action in crop panel in Crop panel (Unrelated to GUI design) this data class is implemented as crop Panel have Seeding, Watering and Harvesting which require multiple variable and a complicated algorithm
    Author:
    Edward Wong - University of Canterbury SENG_201 19/05/2020

    • Constructor Detail

      • Crop_Plot

        public Crop_Plot(boolean plot_available,
                 boolean unlock,
                 int plot_harvest_time,
                 java.lang.String plot_plant)
        Parameters:
        plot_available - Abailability of individual crop plot for seeding/planting (false when occupied)
        unlock - Crop plot 4 is unlock status
        plot_harvest_time - Crop time to be ready for harvest in individual crop plot
        plot_plant - Type of plant thats seed/planted in every crop plot
